column2: but definitely not the last. Came for restaurant week for a GNO. Got the Kentucky Orange Blossom. This is like liquid crack/whisky candy. Terry provided UH-mazing service. He recommended the burger (their signature dish) and it was so worth it. Terry
column3: as well as the rest of the staff
column4: really knows the menu and had food/drink suggestions for all of us. Would definitely come back again.
